title: Can't connect to servers?
body: My connection is fine but i cannot connect to my game, i've tried multiple connections as well? What's happening?

replies.body:
Hi Mari0

Was this just for one game, or is this a problem that happens often?

Mindstar

I keep having this problem, it started today, i get the message "Unable to connect to the server. check your network connections and try again." My connections are fine, I restored my computer to yesterday, was able to play one game and then as im loading into the next, it happened again. Don't know what happened.
